oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Sgt. Carl Cecil Braden to Mrs. W.W. Braden, 1919 March 29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This letter, with envelope, from Sgt. Carl Cecil Braden, HQ Troop, 82nd Div. to Mrs. W. W. Braden in Lewisburg, Tenn. is written on lined YMCA letterhead paper and is dated March 29, 1919. Braden worked in real estate and bought timber before being inducted into the U.S. Army on October 9, 1917. He survived the war and died in 1947. He is buried in Lone Oak Cemetery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
